name: Finding Melodies
description:
Hey,

this Game is about dodging, searching / listening, interacting and walking.

It contains 7 Levels.

Epilepsy Warning! Some Parts of this Game contain flashing Lights.

Controls:

WASD - Movement (In some Levels this may differ)

F - Interact 

R - Special Interaction (Level 7)

Escape - Pause Menu (You might have to press it twice in the Browser version)

Known Bugs :

- You are walking slower based on how much you look up / down

- WebGL only: Camera is snapping
